Text:
Thank you for this wonderful upload! 

Btw, has TTC stopped making guidebooks for its courses?

Dohduhdah do you know about the "Video Aided Instruction" they make some excellent videos about 
topics such as TOFL , GMAT , Grammer courses and more if you can could you upload some of their videos ?

I would really appreciate it a lot if you do so.

awesome upload, thank you for uploading this and many of the other ttc courses... I'm downloading/seeding many of them right now!

I was wondering if you would be able to find the TTC course titled "How Conversation Works"?  I've been looking for it everywhere but can't seem to find it..

Your hard work is much appreciated!
